name: Slipperyness 2!!!
description:
I tried to make sure the bounciness was working with the bounce blocks, but due to a technical error it didn't work out :c

the problem I had was that I accidently used a charactercontroller and not a rigidbody, and even when I did use a rigidbody, I couldn't make the bounces work. And that sucks because I loved this game concept and had many other ideas such as blocks that you can only break through while sliding, but sadly I wasn't up to the task.
